content: In general, I find Stack Exchange a useful tool. Would it be a good idea to make a Mathlib Stack Exchange?
Are there any other languages, let alone libraries, that have their own stackexchange?
There aren't nearly enough users to support an entire stack exchange. You can use the lean tag on SO, but I think you will get best results by just asking questions here
There might be enough users to support a formal methods stack exchange if you throw all ITP and ATP users into one pot

If you ask a question on SO and tag it Lean then there's a bot here which flags it -- see e.g. https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/116290-rss/topic/Newest.20questions.20tagged.20lean.20-.20Stack.20Overflow/near/226312751
